meta.title: EduPro | Professional Training Platform for Africa
meta.description: Transform your skills into concrete opportunities. The first platform connecting companies, professionals, trainers and investors around a common goal: excellence in skills across Africa.
meta.keywords: professional training, e-learning, Africa, skills development, online courses, certifications, corporate training

hero.title: Transform your skills into
hero.subtitle: The first platform that connects companies, professionals, trainers and investors around a common goal: excellence in skills across Africa.

problem.title: The skills gap is slowing African innovation
problem.subtitle: 97% of African talents don't have access to continuous professional training

limitedAccess.title: Limited access
limitedAccess.description: of African workers access continuous professional training.
limitedAccess.consequence: Massive skills gap slowing economic growth.

inadequateSolutions.title: Inadequate solutions
inadequateSolutions.description: International platforms are too expensive and not contextualized to African realities.
inadequateSolutions.consequence: Content disconnected from real local market needs.

unexploitedExpertise.title: Unexploited expertise
unexploitedExpertise.description: African experts cannot digitize and monetize their know-how due to lack of adapted tools.
unexploitedExpertise.consequence: Brain drain and loss of local knowledge.

invisibleROI.title: Invisible ROI
invisibleROI.description: Companies invest in training without being able to measure impact on performance.

problem.closing: What if the solution came from Africa, for Africa?

solution.title: One platform, three revolutions
solution.subtitle: EduPro is the first professional training platform designed for African realities. We combine international quality and local context to create an ecosystem where everyone finds their place.

premiumAccessible.title: Premium Accessible
premiumAccessible.subtitle: International quality at African prices
premiumAccessible.description: World-class content adapted to local context, up to 70% cheaper than international platforms.

aiIntegrated.title: AI Integrated
aiIntegrated.subtitle: Create content 40% faster
aiIntegrated.description: AI assistant to script, create quizzes, generate exercises. Professional training creation has never been so simple.

mobileFirst.title: Mobile-First
mobileFirst.subtitle: Learn anywhere, even offline
mobileFirst.description: Optimized for low bandwidth, native offline mode, smart synchronization. 78% of our traffic is mobile.

stats.title: The numbers that prove our traction

countries.label: COUNTRIES COVERED
countries.sublabel: Senegal â€¢ Ivory Coast â€¢ Rwanda

auger.quote: It's a very good initiative to have a platform that responds to the needs of the African continent. As we progressed, I realized that as trainers, we have the knowledge but didn't know how to deliver it in the digital age. I acquired many skills during this bootcamp, especially course structuring. I'm starting to apply them in my training at my company.
auger.name: Auger MAYOUMA

ibrahima.quote: I congratulate the entire Edupro team for their availability and follow-up during this bootcamp. I had an enriching and inspiring experience. I learned to use digital tools and AI to modernize my courses. Above all, I was able to adapt my previously in-person training to digital format: structured modules, quizzes, certificates and learner tracking. Today, I could deploy my sessions online with a better experience for everyone.
ibrahima.name: Ibrahima YADE
ibrahima.role: COACH - TRAINING TRAINER | GENERAL DIRECTOR ACA

mariame.quote: I would like to thank the team for the initiative and support. Used to webinars and in-person sessions, I discovered an entirely new format... and I come out with real skills! Thanks to courses in video format viewed in advance, course creation was easy. An inspiring collaboration that I look forward to continuing.
mariame.name: Mariame WONE
mariame.role: COACH - TRAINER | Career and professional dynamics management
